name: Match Triple Bubble
description:
What can you find in a big bubble? Donuts, gift boxes, hats, balls, or just numbers? Rotate the bubble in all directions to observe!
Different from other 3 matching games, Match Triple Bubble provides you a new way to find & match! In this 3D matching game, you'll definitely get totally different viewing angles by rotating the big bubble!
⁉How to play
Just like a classic triple match game, the goal in the puzzle is to find & match all the elements presented.
The difference is that you can observe all the items in all directions by rotating the transparent bubble!
While items in the bubble are too hard to distinguish, also you can use hints prop to help you go more smoothly.

Features
Colorful & high quality cute 3D items floating in a bubble, including animals, balls, food and so on!
Unique & All direction viewing angles. You can rotate the bubble as you like. It all depends on you!
Relaxing but challenging! As you go further into the matching puzzle adventure, you'll find the difficulties in the game also level up!
No life limited in this puzzle, you can start it whenever you want.
Challenge yourself in a limited time, improve your skills and concentration.
